text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="avisblatt_schema.xsd"><NUMBER>30</NUMBER><DATE_OF_AD>1746-12-08</DATE_OF_AD><PUBLISHER><NAME>Hans Jacob Bischoffs Buchhandlung</NAME></PUBLISHER><AUTHOR_NOTE><AUTHOR>David Herrliberger</AUTHOR><ROLE>Kupferstecher in Zürich</ROLE></AUTHOR_NOTE><BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO><TITLE>Picardische Ceremonien-Werck</TITLE><VOLUMES_TOTAL>20</VOLUMES_TOTAL><VOLUMES_REMAINING>13</VOLUMES_REMAINING><VOLUMES_AVAILABLE>7</VOLUMES_AVAILABLE><PRICE_INFO><PRICE_UNIT>fl.</PRICE_UNIT><PRICE_TOTAL>36</PRICE_TOTAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME>1</PRICE_PER_VOLUME><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL>12</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>1</CLASS><PRICE>4</PRICE><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS>23</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL>39</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL_UNIT></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>2</CLASS><PRICE>4</PRICE><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS>28</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>3</CLASS><PRICE>36</PRICE></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>1</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Subscribers from the beginning</DESCRIPTION><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL>51</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT></CLASS_NOTE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>2</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Subscribers with less than 7 volumes</DESCRIPTION></CLASS_NOTE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>3</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Late subscribers</DESCRIPTION></CLASS_NOTE></PRICE_INFO></BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO><NOTES><NOTE>End of subscription term for Picardische Ceremonien-Werck</NOTE><NOTE>Subscription price notification</NOTE><NOTE>Subscription deadline reminder</NOTE></NOTES></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"The following corrections and additions were made to the XML structure:

1. Added root element structure with proper namespace and schema reference.
2. Added <NUMBER> tag for the item number (30).
3. Added <DATE_OF_AD> tag for the advertisement date (1746-12-08).
4. Added <PUBLISHER> tag with <NAME> sub-tag for the publisher.
5. Added <AUTHOR_NOTE> section with <AUTHOR> and <ROLE> sub-tags for author details.
6. Added <BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO> wrapper for bibliographic details.
7. Added <VOLUMES_TOTAL>, <VOLUMES_REMAINING>, and <VOLUMES_AVAILABLE> tags for volume information.
8. Added <PRICE_INFO> wrapper for price details with <PRICE_UNIT> tag.
9. Added <PRICE_TOTAL> tag for the total price.
10. Added <PRICE_PER_VOLUME> and <PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL> tags with <PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>.
11. Structured <CLASS_PRICE> tags for each subscription class with <CLASS> and <PRICE> sub-tags.
12. Added <CLASS_NOTE> tags for additional descriptions of each subscription class.
13. Added <PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS> and <PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL> tags for total prices including additional costs.
14. Added <NOTES> section to capture additional notes and reminders.
15. Fixed and standardized currency units and abbreviations (e.g., 'xr.' for 'xr.', 'fl.' for 'fl.').

The original text was restructured to fit a coherent XML schema for book advertisements, ensuring all relevant information is tagged and organized logically."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="avisblatt_schema.xsd"><NUMBER>30</NUMBER><DATE_OF_AD>1746-12-08</DATE_OF_AD><PUBLISHER><NAME>Hans Jacob Bischoffs Buchhandlung</NAME></PUBLISHER><AUTHOR_NOTE><AUTHOR>David Herrliberger</AUTHOR><ROLE>Kupferstecher in Zürich</ROLE></AUTHOR_NOTE><BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO><TITLE>Picardische Ceremonien-Werck</TITLE><VOLUMES_TOTAL>20</VOLUMES_TOTAL><VOLUMES_REMAINING>13</VOLUMES_REMAINING><VOLUMES_AVAILABLE>7</VOLUMES_AVAILABLE><PRICE_INFO><PRICE_UNIT>fl.</PRICE_UNIT><PRICE_TOTAL>36</PRICE_TOTAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME>1</PRICE_PER_VOLUME><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL>12</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>1</CLASS><PRICE>4</PRICE><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS>23</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL>39</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL_UNIT></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>2</CLASS><PRICE>4</PRICE><PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS>28</PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_PRICE><CLASS>3</CLASS><PRICE>36</PRICE></CLASS_PRICE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>1</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Subscribers from the beginning</DESCRIPTION><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL>51</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL><PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>xr.</PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT></CLASS_NOTE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>2</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Subscribers with less than 7 volumes</DESCRIPTION></CLASS_NOTE><CLASS_NOTE><CLASS>3</CLASS><DESCRIPTION>Late subscribers</DESCRIPTION></CLASS_NOTE></PRICE_INFO></BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO><NOTES><NOTE>End of subscription term for Picardische Ceremonien-Werck</NOTE><NOTE>Subscription price notification</NOTE><NOTE>Subscription deadline reminder</NOTE></NOTES></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The following corrections and additions were made to the XML structure:

1. Added root element structure with proper namespace and schema reference.
2. Added <NUMBER> tag for the item number (30).
3. Added <DATE_OF_AD> tag for the advertisement date (1746-12-08).
4. Added <PUBLISHER> tag with <NAME> sub-tag for the publisher.
5. Added <AUTHOR_NOTE> section with <AUTHOR> and <ROLE> sub-tags for author details.
6. Added <BIBLIOGRAPHIC_INFO> wrapper for bibliographic details.
7. Added <VOLUMES_TOTAL>, <VOLUMES_REMAINING>, and <VOLUMES_AVAILABLE> tags for volume information.
8. Added <PRICE_INFO> wrapper for price details with <PRICE_UNIT> tag.
9. Added <PRICE_TOTAL> tag for the total price.
10. Added <PRICE_PER_VOLUME> and <PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL> tags with <PRICE_PER_VOLUME_ADDITIONAL_UNIT>.
11. Structured <CLASS_PRICE> tags for each subscription class with <CLASS> and <PRICE> sub-tags.
12. Added <CLASS_NOTE> tags for additional descriptions of each subscription class.
13. Added <PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS> and <PRICE_TOTAL_CLASS_ADDITIONAL> tags for total prices including additional costs.
14. Added <NOTES> section to capture additional notes and reminders.
15. Fixed and standardized currency units and abbreviations (e.g., 'xr.' for 'xr.', 'fl.' for 'fl.').

The original text was restructured to fit a coherent XML schema for book advertisements, ensuring all relevant information is tagged and organized logically.
